about_the_game:
Master Leaf Blower is a fun-filled arcade game that blends physics-based gameplay with comic book-style storytelling. Become the ultimate leaf blower as you transform from an ordinary hobo into a city savior! Get jobs in various city districts, each with unique challenges, as you take on leaf-blowing missions that test your skills and precision. With dynamic and sometimes crazy levels, this game offers hours of entertainment and a unique take on the simulator genre.

Your primary objective is simple: blow the leaves out of the area. But beware, many things can disturb you, and not every neighborhood is friendly, plus your resources are limited. Show them all that you are the best!



Visit each of the five unique neighborhoods which presents its own set of challenges, testing your leaf-blowing powers to the limit. Upgrade your tools, buy and upgrade your hideout and equipment, meet local characters, travel around the City of Constant Fall in your car, and unveil the epic first chapter of the Master Leaf Blower's story.





Main features (in game now):

  • Physics-based simulation of leaf blowing
  • Chapter one of the epic Master Leaf Blower storyline
  • Storytelling in Comic Book Style
  • 25 unique levels for your leaf-blowing across 5 unique city quarters
  • Overcome challenges to earn money, upgrade your tools, vehicles, hideout, and more
  • Relax, clear out trash, plant some flowers...
  • Travel across the city in a top-down driving minigame
  • Unlock crazy modes for some action and more...





Secondary objectives offer opportunities to earn extra cash and prove your worth as the city's savior. Whether it's clearing out trash to keep the streets clean or planting flowers to beautify the environment, every task brings you one step closer to leaf-blowing glory.



With its physics-based simulation and immersive gameplay, Master Leaf Blower is not just a game—it's an adventure waiting to unfold. Gear up, rev up your leaf blower, and leave a trail of clear streets and satisfied citizens in your wake. The City of Constant Fall is counting on you!
